subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Ettore Messina signed Ginobili at age 21 to play for him in Italy. Messina is now an assistant for the Spurs as Ginobili, at 38, winds down his N.B.A. career.
snippet: Ettore Messina signed Ginobili at age 21 to play for him in Italy. Messina is now an assistant for the Spurs as Ginobili, at 38, winds down his N.B.A. career.
